examples.example: 我微笑着递上自己的名片，期待着与对方开启一段愉快的合作之旅。

translate.english: I smiled and handed over my business card, looking forward to starting a pleasant cooperation journey with the other party.

examples.example: 他礼貌地递出名片，并热情地向对方介绍自己的业务。

translate.english: He politely handed out his business card and passionately introduced his business to the other party.

examples.example: 他精心设计了自己的名片，展现出独特的个人风格。

translate.english: He elaborately designed his business card, showing a unique personal style.
